item.title: The Best S2S VPN Settings
item.author: Caleb Delbrugge
item.description: Introduction When configuring a Site to Site VPN, you may be wondering what the best settings are such as: IKEv1 or v2 Encryption Integrity Lifetime PFS It’s a good question, as I’ve tried to figure that out myself. I stumbled upon this recommendation from NIST called “Suite-B” - and it seems to answer the question. There’s an RFC for it below. RFC 6379 - Suite B Cryptographic Suites for IPsec

item.title: F5 301b v1 Objectives
item.author: Caleb Delbrugge
item.description: As far as I know these are the original objectives first published for the exam. These are no longer official. They were found in the old study guide which can no longer be found. ================================================================= Section 1 – Troubleshoot Basic Virtual Server Connectivity Issues ================================================================= Objective - 1.01 - Given a scenario, determine the appropriate profile setting modifications 1.01a – Determine the effect of changing profile settings on application traffic 1.

item.title: F5 301b v1.1 Objectives
item.author: Caleb Delbrugge
item.description: These were the official 11.5 objectives but modified by me. They have been cleaned up even removed in some cases. This objective list I prefer over the current ones that are official. ================================================================ Section 1 - Maintain Application and LTM Device Health ================================================================ Objective 1.01 Given a scenario, determine the appropriate profile setting modifications. 1.01a - Given a scenario of client or server side buffer issues, packet loss, or congestion, select the appropriate TCP or UDP profile to correct the issue 1.

item.title: F5 301b v2 Objectives
item.author: Caleb Delbrugge
item.description: These are the official exam objectives. ================================================================= Section 1 - Troubleshoot Basic Virtual Server Connectivity Issues ================================================================= Objective - 1.01 - Given a scenario, determine the appropriate profile setting modifications 1.01a - Given a scenario of client or server side buffer issues, packet loss, or congestion, select the appropriate TCP or UDP profile to correct the issue 1.01b - Given a scenario determine when an application would benefit from HTTP Compression and/or Web Acceleration profile Objective - 1.

item.title: F5 301b Study Guide
item.author: Caleb Delbrugge
item.description: Introduction Hey all, This is the study guide I’ve been building since I started studying for this exam way back in 2017. I’ve renewed it 4 times now so I have a pretty good grasp of what is going to be on it and what study materials to use. Hopefully it can help fill any gaps you may have. I’ve sourced the material from solution articles, experience, and manuals. About the Exam The test itself is very challenging.
